1.content:
All things begin with a beginning.

In this case, choose where you want to begin.

Remember, this is a fetish story. You can use anime characters, not use them, do whatever you want. The story can be SFW, NSFW, or whatever you like. This is, after all, anything goes.

111.title: Anime characters

choices: Ash is Oblivious, Delia is a Yandere Cannibal
1111.content:
The main protagonist of the anime! What shall our boy get up to?

1.) All of Ash's female friends from past animes come back, and all of them want to be with him. He is scared of hurting someone if he picks someone, but to his surprise, they want to share him...

2.) Ash's mother is a great cook. He loves eating her food and is getting mighty fat because of it! People and Pokemon around the area keep vanishing, though...

3.) (Anthro Pokemon, multiples of each Pokemon, no species is single gender) Ash is a human in a world of anthro Pokemon. Lusty boy that he is, he's decided that he's going to eat one of every Pokemon! His bellyfat will be his Pokedex! And if he gets to bang his meals along the way, since he plans to stick to females, all the better.

4.) Ash and Pikachu travel to a new continent with new regions. A continent called Crosso'Var
1111.title: Ash Ketchum

choices: Ash decides to start simple, with a Bulbasaur...
Ash ends up meeting a Pikachu, who wants to help him fill out his Bellydex...
Ash is confronted by an Officer Jenny while leaving town...
Ash meets a Legendary right off the bat... and is in danger...
11113.content:
In a world of bipedal, sapient Pokemon, it can be hard to be a human. And indeed, humans tend to get marginalized and bullied a lot. Even eaten alive, swallowed whole and digested. Because of this bias against humans, digestion deaths tend to go unpunished. Ash Ketchum doesn't care, though.

Charming for his age, he has set for himself an ambitious goal. To bed and eat a woman from EVERY species of Pokemon. He's one of the few humans with the ability to swallow others whole, an ability universal among Pokemon, and he's just cunning enough to avoid danger. He knows it'll take a while. But he plans to get every variant, every shiny, every FORM of a Pokemon digesting in his belly. And he won't stop until his 'bellydex' is complete. He even has a folder reserved for pictures of his belly after swallowing someone.

Yes, Ash Ketchum was ambitious. He even swallowed his mother up on the day he was set to leave, spending the whole time digesting her and making her the first picture in his album, a shot of his belly he labeled 'Mom.' Ash was no misogynist. He recognized that each woman he planned to eat had their own lives and value. He just didn't CARE, and thought of women as his favorite food.

And so, the evil young boy went off to complete his bellydex...
11113.title: Gotta Nom Them All!

choices: The two head out, encountering a Bulbasaur...
As it just so happens, Red had a catch for him already...
Meanwhile, down the road, Ash's rival makes an evil deal...
Meanwhile, a familiar trio of nincompoops is making plans...
111132.content:
Ash Ketchum looked down at his phone, smiling at the picture of his belly with his mother stuffed inside it. He was dressed simply for his journey, a black t-shirt and blue jeans, a blue jacket with short white sleaves, a red and white cap, and green fingerless gloves. He had a backpack with extra food and water in it, as well as basic camping supplies, and he had a bicycle parked nearby. He patted his belly, which was still a little plump from devouring his mother, playing with the soft, squishy As he admired the picture, he heard a voice behind him.

"Your own Mom? Nice," said the voice.

Ash blinked, and turned around, seeing a pudgy Pikachu boy around the same age as him. He was a bit fatter than Ash, sporting a wider gut, but he was dressed similarly, save for his jacket being red with white sleeves, his gloves being black, and his cap having a different design. "Relax, kid," the Pikachu said. "I'm not gonna eatcha."

"...Don't call me kid," Ash said. "If you're not the same age as me, I'll suck my own dick."

The Pikachu laughed. "Okay, okay, sorry. Name's Red," he said.

"Yeah, I noticed a color motif," Ash said, smirking. "Ash Ketchum."

"Pleasure to meet you," Red said. "I saw that you titled that gallery 'Bellydex.' Goin' for the full list?"

"And shinies, and alternate forms," Ash said, scrolling through the list he'd set up. "I'm going to have a COMPLETE 'dex."

"Ambitious, for a human," Red said, nodding. "Even if you are one that can eat others like Pokemon can."

Ash smiled. "I have my ways," he said.

"And what about when you meet someone your ways don't work on?" Red asked, smirking.

"...I'll figure something out," Ash said.

Red scoffed. "Yeah, sure," he said. "What you need, m'friend, is a bodyguard. Someone to help you catch your prey. You goin' for a single gender?"

"All girls," Ash confirmed.

"All right, fair enough," Red said. "Which probably means I'm safe."

"Never assume," Ash said, smirking.

Red grinned. "Oh, I definitely like you," he said. "Anyway, what I'm saying is this - I wanna help you fill out your 'dex. I'll keep others off you while you eat, and if need be knock out anyone too tough for you. It'll be good training. Plus I might find a Thunder Stone along the way, which would be awesome"

Ash looked surprised. "...Seriously?" he asked. "What's the catch?"

"I get to fuck 'em," Red said. "Plus sometimes I want to fuck them into your mouth."

"...And if you end up with your dick in my mouth?" Ash said.

"I'm bi and your cute," Red said, grinning and waggling his eyebrows. "I wouldn't mind at all."

Ash blushed. "W-Well... We'll discuss that later," he said. "I do admit it'd be easier if I had help, since aside from being able to eat people, I don't have a Pokemon's power."

Red nodded. "So we're in?"

"Yeah," Ash said. "Welcome to the team."

"Nice," the Pikachu said. "You won't regret it."
111132.title: A Destined Partnership, No Matter The World...

choices: Equestris (My Little Pony crossover, humanized characters)
Smashtopia (Smash Bros characters as Pokemon Trainers)
11114.content:
Ash was excited. It had been a few years since his journey started, and he still enjoyed traveling to new places. And now, a new continent had been accepted into the global league. The continent of Crosso'Var. He prepared to head out there, looking over the regions to see where he would go first. There were so many interesting-looking options. Equestris, which was known to have a philosphy of the six virtures of Friendship. Felnyan, where a unique people supposedly evolved from cats instead of apes. Smashtopia, where trainers skilled enough to fight Pokemon themselves were supposed to live. Mobius, rumored to be in the middle of a civil war against a tyrannical ruler. And so many more.

Ash didn't know where to begin first! They all sounded so interesting!
11114.title: Blatant Crossover Excuse Thread

111145.content:
Battlestreet (Multi fighting game crossover) - A region where martial artists are the primary Pokemon trainers, and to prove yourself is extremely hard. Visiting trainers are allowed, but to become a trainer in Battlestreet, you have to prove that you're as much of a fighter as your Pokemon...

Monmountain (Undertale crossover, humanized characters) - A region entirely on a mountain, where a king and queen rule over an society that is rather... quirky.

Royale Peninsula (Fortnite Crossover) - A region that favors multi-battles, and trainers like to dress up to stand out from one another. The region is also known for its unusual storms, and many mysteries...

Herotia (Marvel/DC crossover) - A realm with costumed trainers that use their Pokemon in conjunction with other talents to either be a menace or to save others...
111145.title: Somewhere else...

1111455.content:
Musicaria (No Straight Roads crossover) - A region where music is king, and battles must be on the beat to properly triumph.

Auradon (Disney crossover, humanized characters) - A region where joy and laughter rule, with a dark secret behind it.

Heart's Dive (Kingdom Hearts crossover) - A realm where strange new Pokemon have been sighted. It has a connection to Auradon, and they're rumored to be at war.

Digitrix (Digimon crossover, humanized characters) - A seemingly normal region, but the trainers are almost like Pokemon themselves...
1111455.title: Somewhere else...

This branch specifically has Jessie, James, and Meowth as a whole being the focus instead of just one of them. Anyway. What happens to our trio of goofy failure villains?

1.) Jessie and James have finally stopped denying how they feel for each other. They aren't lovey-dovey types, but they deeply care for each other... and have mad, passionate sex a lot. With no protection. Which results in the obvious happening...

2.) The trio get dumped in a vat of chemicals but emerge surprisingly unscathed. It's only later when the changes start to actually happen.

3.) Giovanni pushes the trio too far, and they quit. They have no idea what to do now.

4.) James and Jesse decide to seduce every Gym Leader they come across and steal their Pokemon that way.

112.title: OCs

choices: Andrew and Salazzle are enjoying a cuddle
Salazzle finds some female Pokemon for Andrew
Andrew has a rare human lover
1121.content:
Andrew Davis was a trainer from the Maldash region, which notable trainer Ash Ketchum hadn't visited yet. His first Pokemon was a Salazzle he had raised from a Salandit. And the two were in love with each other. Andrew was a handsome man, buff from years of adventuring, with dark brown hair that he kept shaved short and stubble from a beard. He generally wore sweatpants, boots, and a tattered t-shirt with holes in it. Technically speaking, he was a gym leader. Although his 'gym' was wherever he decided to be at the time, the Pokemon Leagues of various regions recognized his status.

He liked living off of the land, although he had a house back in Maldash. He was a skilled survivalist, he and his Salazzle capable of handling almost anything. The thing was? Andrew was only mildly attracted to human females. He was, however, VERY attracted to female Pokemon. He never broadcast it, never made a big deal out of it. But he and his Salazzle not only loved each other, they were also lovers.

The Salazzle was also a naughty sort, and tended to use her pheromones to find Andrew many Pokemon lovers. He had girls on every continent, and wondered if he'd managed to get any of them pregnant. As when he visted those regions again, his lovers always seemed to remember him fondly. Life was good. He had his Salazzle, he had his supplies, he had his lovers, and he had his freedom. Everything was going to be fine...

123312.title: Predatory Duo

choices: Later, Renamon and Rika start feeling very hungry...
Guilmon decides to eat a blob too...
1233122.content:
In the world you know, the Digimon and their Tamers defeated the D-Reaper after it nearly destroyed both worlds, and the Tamers were forced to send their Digimon home to save them, potentially never seeing them again.

In this world, the Tamers never encountered the D-Reaper, Zhuqiaomon surrendering Calumon without a fight after Azulongmon convinced him to focus on the D-Reaper. They and the other two Digimon Sovereigns, Baihumon and Ebonwumon, managed to defeat the D-Reaper and destroy it before it became too powerful, although just barely, leaving them very weak. But tiny bits of the D-Reaper survived. Little blobs of red goo eventually making their way to the human world, some of them fading.

Several, however, lasted much longer. Long enough for two Digimon to find them. Specifically, the partner Digimon of Rika Nonaka and Takato Matsuda. Character development they and their Tamers had during the D-Reaper saga happened in a different way, but their relationships with their Tamers were just as close as they were in the world you know.

Renamon and Guilmon stared at the floating blobs curiously. They seemed harmless enough, and just bobbed around in midair when they were touched. Neither sexy fox Digimon or naive lizard Digimon could make sense of them.

"...Well, they're certainly squishy," Renamon said, holding one of the blobs and squeezing it. She tossed it aside and wiped her hand on the ground.

Guilmon looked at the blobs, then at Renamon, then back at the blobs. "...I dare you to eat one," he said suddenly.

Renamon gave him a confused look. "Excuse me?"

"I saw it on a show," Guilmon said, grinning. "I think it was an American show... something called 'Jackass.' They dared people to do things."

Renamon quirked an eyebrow. "You're taking things from a show called 'Jackass.'"

"It was funny!" Guilmon said. "This one guy put a big jellyfish on his back!"

Renamon's jaw dropped. "...Guilmon, jellyfish are potentially lethal!"

Guilmon blinked. "Really?"

Renamon nodded. "YES!" she said, incredulous, explaining jellyfish toxin to him. Guilmon's batwing-like ears drooped.

"I didn't know that..." he said.

Renamon shook her head. "Just because someone on the television is doing something stupid, doesn't mean either of us should!" she said firmly.

Guilmon nodded. He understood... intellectually. But he really wanted to see Renamon eat one of the blob things for some reason. "Well, okay. If you're too scared to..."

Renamon scowled. "I fear nothing," she said, offended.

"Then why don't you eat one?" Guilmon said, smiling innocently.

Renamon sputtered. "Because I don't want to!" she said.

"Scardeymon," Guilmon said, remembering a taunt Impmon used on him one time.

"I AM NOT AFRAID!" Renamon said angrily.

"Then eat it!" Guilmon insisted.

Angry, and not thinking straight, Renamon growled. "You know what? FINE! I will!" she said. She grabbed two of the floating red blobs and stuck them in her mouth. They wriggled about for a moment on her tongue, and she swallowed them, a brief glow of red passing down her throat. "..."

Renamon blinked. Guilmon frowned. "How'd they taste?"

"Like nothing," Renamon said, shrugging. "This was completely pointless."

"Awww," Guilmon said.

Renamon shook her head, mad at herself for Guilmon goading her into the dare. "I'm going home," she said, flash stepping away. Meanwhile, inside her stomach, the D-Reaper bits she swallowed were digested, intigrating with her code permanently, changing her. And as she was changed, Rika's Digivice briefly glowed red, Reaper code merging with her as well...
1233122.title: Don't Eat The Red Goo

1351.content:
To say that Kyle Zork was not a nice person was putting it mildly. The Zoroark was so psychotically evil, he became a Shadow Pokemon without any need for an external influence. Tall for his breed, six foot seven, the red on his claws and mane were actually a ghostly white, his fur darker shades of black. His eyes were red with green irises, and a demented smirk was on his face. He dressed casually, black sweatpants and a black t-shirt with a zipper down the front, wearing shoes modified to let his footpaw claws free. He was a pure predator in every sense of the work, and his belly, a round, soft bulge of fat, reflected that.

(Granted, zipper front shirts were also a hallmark of predators in this world.)

He liked to eat, and he liked sex. If he could fit his dick in a hole, he'd fuck it. Consent was not necessary in his eyes. He very rarely ate normal food, preferring something he could attack, violate, and eat. He'd eat anyone. Adults, teens, children, no matter what their line of work was, no matter how fat or thin they were, he'd gobble them up. Some of his favorite snacks were the babies of inattentive mothers. If he saw someone with a stroller, chatting away on her phone, he'd use his illusion powers to disappear and grab the child out of their stroller, turning them into a bulge in his belly. By the time they noticed their child was gone, he'd be halfway down the block.

Sometimes, Kyle would torment his prey. He'd gulp down their family members one by one and make them rub his belly, feeling them digest inside his gut or balls. In the latter case, he'd force his target to give him a blowjob and cum their family down their throat. He got off on being hated as much as he got off on being feared or causing pain. And because he loved being hated so much, willing prey disgusted him. He'd go out of his way to torment them and make them hate him, and he wouldn't always eat them. Sometimes he'd just knock them up and let them carry his children, some of whom he'd eat later.

He was evil. He was psychotic. He wasn't stupid, though.

If faced with someone with more power or skill, or he wasn't in a position to ambush and disable them, he would back down. He would also form casual relationships with other predators. He wasn't above faking normal behavior to make friends. And if they enjoyed his wickedness, he'd become true friends with them, engaging in casual sex. One of his closest friends was a Blaziken who ran a gymnasium, and frequently provided alibies and a place for him to rest between meals. She got off on his cruelty, quite literally, the two meeting after he spotted her masturbating to violating one of his future meals. She eagerly let him fuck his meal down her throat, and the two had been inseparable ever since. So close were they that they were actually thinking about having kids... (Marriage, both of them thought, was not necessary.)

Kyle was a predator in every sense of the word. And he was perfectly content with his life.
1351.title: Kyle the Zoroark

info.brief_description: An erotic Pokemon and/or Digimon interactive with very few limits.
info.description:
Pretty much exactly what it says on the opening. A Pokemon/Digimon-centric interactive. Almost every fetish allowed, except scat and watersports (I will allow MENTION of it, but nothing excessively detailed) and torture. None of that. Nope.

Beyond that, go wild and have fun. Pick a character and start from there. Do anything you want to do to the mons or with the mons.
